sentences.text: Our Values
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ethics: Our actions are founded on trust, honesty and integrity through open communications and adherence to the highest standards of personal, professional and business ethics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Quality: Our commitment to quality drives us to make continuous improvements in our quest for excellence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Diversity: We value diversity, as well as the dignity and worth of each employee, and believe that a diverse and inclusive workforce is critical to our continued success.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Value: We are committed to creating value for all stakeholders  employees, customers, investors and our communities  through the optimum development and utilization of our resources.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Service: We provide responsive, flexible service to customers and commit to preserving the environment, providing a safe work environment and improving the quality of life for employees where they live and work.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Vision
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be a leading midstream service provider that creates exceptional value for all stakeholders by:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Operating our integrated midstream assets safely and efficiently and making prudent financial management decisions enabling ONEOK to execute its growth strategies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Maximizing dividend payout while maintaining prudent financial strength and flexibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Attracting, selecting, developing and retaining a diverse group of employees to support strategy execution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Mission
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To create shareholder value by profitably providing reliable energy and energy-related services in a safe and environmentally responsible manner.

sentences.text: April 6, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Shareholder:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You cordially are invited to attend the annual meeting of shareholders of ONEOK, Inc., which will be held at 9:00 a.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Central Daylight Time on Wednesday, May 24, 2017, at ONEOK Plaza, 100 West Fifth Street, Tulsa, Oklahoma 74103.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The matters to be considered and voted on at the meeting are set forth in the attached notice of the annual meeting and are described in the attached proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A copy of our 2016 annual report to shareholders also is enclosed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A report on our 2016 performance will be presented at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We look forward to greeting as many of our shareholders as possible at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We know, however, that most of our shareholders will be unable to attend.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, proxies are being solicited so that each shareholder has an opportunity to vote by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can authorize a proxy over the Internet or by telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instructions for using these convenient services are included in the proxy statement and on the proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Of course, if you prefer, you may vote by mail by signing, dating and returning the enclosed proxy card in the enclosed postage-paid envelope.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held by a broker, bank, trustee or other similar fiduciary, unless you provide your broker, bank, trustee or other similar fiduciary with voting instructions, your shares will not be voted in the election of directors or in certain other important proposals as described in the accompanying proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consequently, please provide your voting instructions to your broker, bank, trustee or other similar fiduciary in a timely manner to ensure that your shares will be voted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Regardless of the number of shares you own, your vote is important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I urge you to submit your proxy as soon as possible so that you can be sure your shares will be voted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thank you for your investment in ONEOK and your continued support.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: John W. Gibson Chairman of the Board
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: services to provide supply and market connectivity.

sentences.text: We expect producers to require midstream services to connect production with end-use markets, increased demand for NGL products from the petrochemical industry and NGL exporters and increased demand for natural gas from power plants currently fueled by coal and natural gas exports to Mexico.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ONEOK Partners Merger.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On January 31, 2017, we and ONEOK Partners L.P. entered into an Agreement and Plan of Merger (the Merger Agreement), by and among us, New Holdings Subsidiary, LLC, a subsidiary of ours (Merger Sub), ONEOK Partners, and ONEOK Partners GP, L.L.C., the sole general partner of ONEOK Partners, pursuant to which we will acquire all of the outstanding common units representing limited partner interests in ONEOK Partners not already directly or indirectly owned by us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon the terms and conditions set forth in the Merger Agreement, Merger Sub will be merged with and into ONEOK Partners, with ONEOK Partners continuing as a wholly owned subsidiary of ours, in a taxable transaction to ONEOK Partners unitholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, we received, through our limited and general partner interests in ONEOK Partners, distributions of $790.0 million, an increase of approximately 11.9 percent compared with 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, we were able to deliver value to our shareholders in the form of an approximate 1.6 percent increase in our 2016 dividends compared with 2015, while retaining nearly $250 million in cash, providing significant financial flexibility during a period of lower commodity prices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Financial Performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All references to income as used in this Business Highlights section refer to income from continuing operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Until completion of the merger transaction referenced above, we will continue as the sole general partner and, as of December 31, 2016, we owned 41.2 percent of ONEOK Partners, one of the largest publicly traded master limited partnerships.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We provide management and resources to ONEOK Partners, enabling it to execute its growth strategies and allowing us to grow our dividend.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ONEOK Partners applies its core capabilities of gathering, processing, fractionating, transporting, storing and marketing natural gas and natural gas liquids (NGL) through the rebundling of services across the value chains through vertical integration in an effort to provide its customers with premium services at lower costs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ONEOK Partners is a leader in the gathering, processing, storage and transportation of natural gas in the United States.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, ONEOK Partners owns one of the nations premier natural gas liquids systems, connecting NGL supply in the Mid-Continent, Permian and Rocky Mountain regions with key market centers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our 2016 consolidated operating income was approximately $1.3 billion, compared with approximately $1.0 billion in 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 income from continuing operations attributable to us was approximately $354.1 million, or $1.67 per diluted share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2015 income from continuing operations attributable to us was approximately $251.1 million, or $1.19 per diluted share, which included non-cash impairment charges of approximately $264.3 million, or $0.33 per diluted share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While 2016 marked another year of challenges in the energy markets, our performance reflected our continued attention to prudent capital deployment and effective execution of our business strategies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ONEOK Partners operates predominantly fee-based businesses in each of its three business segments and its consolidated earnings were approximately 88 percent fee-based in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We continue to expect demand for ONEOK Partners midstream

sentences.text: EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION HIGHLIGHTS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Program Design.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A principal feature of our compensation program is the determination of executive pay by our Executive Compensation Committee (referred to as the Executive Compensation Committee or the Committee) and Board of Directors based on a comprehensive review of quantitative and qualitative factors designed to produce long-term business success.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive compensation program is designed to attract, motivate and retain the key executives who drive our success and who are leaders in the industry, to reward for company performance and to align the long-term interests of our executive officers with those of our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation philosophy and related governance features are complemented by several specific elements that are designed to achieve these objectives and are summarized below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What We Dont Do:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What We Do:            Compensation Program ContinuityThe components of our executive compensation program have remained substantially the same for several years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe our program is designed efficiently, is well aligned with the interests of our shareholders and is instrumental to achieving our business goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our shareholders have provided strong support for our compensation program over the years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No Hedging of Company stockOur policy prohibits our named executive officers from engaging in hedging activities with our stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No Pledging of Company stockOur officers
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No Pledging of Company stockOur officers and directors may not hold our securities in a margin account or pledge our securities as collateral for a loan, subject to an exception which may be granted by our chief executive officer for loans (not margin accounts) which can be repaid without resorting to the pledged securities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No Single Trigger for Cash Change-in-Control PlansAll change-in-control benefits under our Change-in-Control Severance Plan are double trigger.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No Tax Gross-upsWe do not provide tax
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independent Committee Determination Our Executive Compensation Committee, composed solely of independent directors, makes all compensation decisions regarding our named executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These decisions are then submitted to the full Board for its consideration.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No Significant PerquisitesOur executive officers, including the named executive officers, receive no recurring significant perquisites or other personal benefits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prudent Risk ManagementThe Committee is mindful of not encouraging excessive risks when it designs compensation programs and sets targets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pay for PerformanceA significant portion of the compensation for our named executive officers is in the form of at-risk variable compensation based on company and individual performance, with a focus on creating long-term shareholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Competitive CompensationIn order to attract and retain qualified executives, our compensation programs provide a competitive total pay opportunity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Multiple Performance MetricsVariable compensation is based on more than one measure to encourage balanced incentives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Awards Are CappedAll of our variable compensation plans have caps on plan formulas; provided that, our Chief Executive Officer may recommend to the Committee adjustments to the individual performance multiplier in excess of 125% in certain limited cases of exceptional performance with regard to awards under our annual
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: short-term incentive plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Retention IncentivesA significant portion of total compensation relies on multi-year vesting requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Ownership GuidelinesWe have market competitive stock ownership guidelines for our directors and executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Clawback ProvisionsOur clawback policy provides for the adjustment or recovery of compensation in certain circumstances.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independent ConsultantThe Committee engages an executive compensation consultant that is independent under the Securities and Exchange Commission rules and NYSE listing standards to provide advice and expertise on the design and implementation of our executive and director compensation programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The rules of the NYSE determine whether proposals presented at shareholder meetings are routine or non-routine.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a proposal is routine, a broker, bank, trustee or other similar fiduciary holding shares for an owner in street name may vote for the proposal without receiving voting instructions from the owner under certain circumstances.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a proposal is non- routine, the broker, bank, trustee or other similar fiduciary may vote on the proposal only if the owner has provided voting instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A broker non-vote occurs when the broker, bank, trustee or other similar fiduciary is unable to vote on a proposal because the proposal is non-routine and the owner does not provide any voting instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that maintaining Mr. Gibsons continuing service as non-executive Chairman of the Board provides the most effective leadership model for our Board and our company.

sentences.text: In making this determination, the Board considered the advantages to our company of maintaining the continuity of Mr. Gibsons effective leadership as Chairman of the Board based on, among other factors, his lengthy service as an executive officer of our company, including as chief executive officer from 2007 until his retirement on January 31, 2014, his strong leadership skills, his extensive knowledge and experience regarding our operations and the industries and markets in which we compete, as well as his ability to promote communication and to synchronize strategic objectives and activities between our Board and our senior management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This process ensures continuity of leadership over the long term, and it forms the basis on which our company makes ongoing leadership assignments.

sentences.text: The responsibilities of our Board committees are summarized below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From time to time the Board, in its discretion, may form other committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: evaluating, in consultation with our Corporate Governance Committee, the performance of our Chief Executive Officer, and recommending to our Board of Directors the compensation of our Chief Executive Officer and our other executive officers;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee represents and assists our Board of Directors with the oversight of the integrity of our financial statements and internal control over financial reporting, our compliance with legal and regulatory requirements, the independence, qualifications and performance of our independent registered public accounting firm and the performance of our internal audit function.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The responsibilities of the Audit Committee include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviewing and approving, in consultation with our Corporate Governance Committee, the annual objectives of our Chief Executive Officer;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviewing our executive compensation program to ensure the attraction, retention and appropriate compensation of executive officers in order to motivate their performance in the achievement of our business objectives and to align their interests with the long-term interests of our shareholders;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: appointing, compensating and overseeing our independent auditor, including review of their qualifications, independence and performance;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: assessing the risks associated with our compensation program; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviewing the scope, plans and results relating to external audits of our financial statements and our internal audits;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviewing and making recommendations to the full Board on executive officer and director compensation and personnel policies, programs and plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: monitoring and evaluating our financial condition;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: monitoring and evaluating the integrity of our financial reporting processes and procedures;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Executive Compensation Committee meets periodically during the year to review our executive and director compensation policies and practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive officer salaries and short- and long-term incentive compensation are determined annually by this committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The scope of the authority of this committee is not limited except as set forth in its charter and by applicable law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This committee has the authority to delegate duties to subcommittees of this committee, or to other standing committees of the Board of Directors, as it deems necessary or appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This committee may not delegate to a subcommittee any authority required by any law, regulation or listing standard to be exercised by this committee as a whole.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: assessing our significant financial risks and exposures and evaluating the adequacy of our internal controls in connection with such risks and exposures, including, but not limited to, internal controls over financial reporting and disclosure controls and procedures;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviewing policies and procedures on risk-control assessment and accounting risk exposure, including our companywide risk control activities and our business- continuity and disaster-recovery plans; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: monitoring our compliance with our policies on ethical business conduct.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All members of our Executive Compensation Committee are independent under the independence requirements of the NYSE applicable to compensation committee members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our independent registered public accounting firm reports directly to our Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The executive compensation group in our corporate human resources department supports, in consultation with our Chief Executive Officer, the Executive Compensation Committee in its work.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All members of our Audit Committee are independent under the independence requirements of the NYSE and the Securities and Exchange Commission applicable to audit committee members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that Julie H. Edwards, Gary D. Parker, Brian L. Derksen and Randall J. Larson are each an audit committee financial expert under the applicable rules of the Securities and Exchange Commission.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Meridian Compensation Partners reported directly to the Executive Compensation Committee.

sentences.text: Our corporate governance guidelines provide that the Board of Directors is responsible for selecting candidates for Board membership and delegates the screening process to the Corporate Governance Committee of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This committee, with recommendations and input from our Chairman of the Board, our Chief Executive Officer and members of our Board, evaluates the qualifications of each director candidate and assesses the appropriate mix of skills, qualifications and characteristics required of Board members in the context of the perceived needs of the Board at a given point in time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee is responsible for recommending candidates for nomination by the Board for election as members of our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance Committee is responsible for overseeing our companys governance, including the selection of directors and the Boards practices and effectiveness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These responsibilities include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: identifying and recommending qualified director candidates, including qualified director candidates suggested by our shareholders in written submissions to our corporate secretary in accordance with our corporate governance guidelines and our By-laws or in accordance with the rules of the Securities Exchange Commission;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our corporate governance guidelines provide that candidates for nomination by the Board must be committed to devoting the time and effort necessary to be productive members of the Board and that, in nominating candidates, the Board will endeavor to establish director diversity in personal background, race, gender, age and nationality.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The guidelines also provide that the Board will seek to maintain a mix that includes, but is not limited to, the following areas of core competency: accounting and finance; investment banking; business judgment; management; energy industry knowledge; operations; leadership; strategic vision; law; and corporate relations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: making recommendations to the Board with respect to electing directors and filling vacancies on the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: adopting an effective process for director selection and tenure by making recommendations on the Boards organization and practices and by aiding in identifying and recruiting director candidates;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviewing and making recommendations to the Board with respect to the organization, structure, size, composition and operation of the Board and its committees;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: in consultation with our Chairman of the Board, our Chief Executive Officer and the Executive Compensation Committee, overseeing management succession and development; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committees charter provides that it has the responsibility, in consultation with the Chairman of the Board and the Chief Executive Officer, to search for, recruit, screen, interview and select candidates for the position of director as necessary to fill vacancies on the Board or the additional needs of the Board and to consider management and shareholder recommendations for candidates for nomination by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In carrying out this responsibility, the Corporate Governance Committee evaluates the qualifications and performance of incumbent directors and determines whether to recommend them for re-election to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, this committee determines, as necessary, the portfolio of skills, experience, diversity, perspective and background required for the effective functioning of the Board considering our business strategy and our regulatory, geographic and market environments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviewing, assessing risk and making recommendations with respect to other corporate governance matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All members of our Corporate Governance Committee are independent under the independence requirements of the NYSE.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Executive Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the intervals between meetings of our Board of Directors, the Executive Committee may, except as otherwise provided in our By-laws and applicable law, exercise the powers and authority of the full Board in the oversight of our property, affairs and business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The function of this committee is to act on major matters where it deems action appropriate, which provides a degree of flexibility and ability to respond to time-sensitive business and legal matters without calling a special meeting of our full Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Executive Committee reports to the Board at its next meeting on any actions taken by the committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our corporate governance guidelines contain a policy regarding the Corporate Governance Committees consideration of prospective director candidates recommended by shareholders for nomination by our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under this policy, any shareholder who wishes to recommend a prospective candidate for nomination by our Board for election at our 2018 annual meeting should send a letter of recommendation to our corporate secretary at our principal executive offices by no later than September 30, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The letter should include the name, address and number of shares owned by the recommending shareholder (including, if the recommending shareholder is not a shareholder of record, proof of ownership of the type referred
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to in Rule 14a-8(b)(2) of the proxy rules of the Securities
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: and Exchange Commission), the prospective candidates name and address, a description of the prospective candidates background, qualifications and relationships, if any, with our company and all other information necessary for our Board to determine whether the prospective candidate meets the independence standards under the rules of the NYSE and our director independence guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A signed statement from the prospective candidate should accompany the letter of recommendation indicating that he or she consents to being considered as a nominee of the Board and that, if nominated by the Board and elected by the shareholders, he or she will serve as a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee will evaluate prospective candidates recommended by shareholders for nomination by our Board in light of the various factors set forth above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our By-laws permit a shareholder, or a group of up to twenty shareholders, owning 3% or more of ONEOKs common stock continuously for a period of at least three years, to nominate for election to our Board and have such director nominations included in our proxy materials, a number of director candidates equal to the greater of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) two individuals or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the closest whole number that does not exceed 20% of our Board, provided that the shareholder(s) and the nominee(s) satisfy certain requirements specified in the By-laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under these procedures, notice must be received by our corporate secretary at our principal executive offices not less than 120 calendar days, and not more than 150 calendar days, before the first anniversary of the date that our proxy statement was released to shareholders in connection with our 2017 annual meeting of shareholders (i.e., notice must be received no earlier than November 7, 2017 and later than December 7, 2017).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with our By-laws, the shareholder notice must contain certain information about the candidate the shareholder(s) desires to nominate for election as a director, the shareholder(s) giving the notice and the beneficial owner(s), if any, on whose behalf the nomination is made.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Neither the Corporate Governance Committee, nor the Board, nor our company itself discriminates in any way against prospective candidates for nomination by the Board on the basis of age, sex, race, religion, or other personal characteristics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are no differences in the manner in which the Corporate Governance Committee or the Board evaluates prospective candidates based on whether the prospective candidate is recommended by a shareholder or by the Corporate Governance Committee, provided that the recommending shareholder furnishes to our company a letter of recommendation containing the information described above along with the signed statement of the prospective candidate referred to above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DIRECTOR COMPENSATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Executive Compensation Committee reviews director compensation on an annual basis in consultation with the Committees independent compensation consultant, Meridian Compensation Partners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This review includes consideration of director compensation data compiled by Meridian for the same peer group used to assess competitive compensation for our executive officers in order to assess the competitive levels and type of compensation for our directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to considering director compensation data compiled by Meridian, the Committee also considers relevant factors such as our companys financial and operational performance when reviewing director compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After completing its review, the Committee submits its recommendation for director compensation to the full Board of Directors for approval.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to having the ability to recommend prospective candidates for nomination by our Board, under our By-laws, shareholders may themselves nominate candidates for election at an annual meeting of shareholders so long as they are shareholders of record when they give the notice described below and on the record date for the relevant annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any shareholder who desires to nominate candidates for election as directors at our 2018 annual meeting must follow the procedures set forth in our By-laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under these procedures, notice of a shareholder nomination for the election of a director must be received by our corporate secretary at our principal executive offices not less than 120 calendar days before the first anniversary of the date that our proxy statement was released to shareholders in connection with our 2017 annual meeting of shareholders (i.e., notice must be received no later than December 7, 2017).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the date of the 2018 annual meeting is more than 30 days after May 24, 2018, the first anniversary of our 2017 annual meeting, our corporate secretary must receive notice of a shareholder nomination by the close of business on the tenth day following the earlier of the day on which notice of the date of the 2018 annual meeting is mailed to shareholders or the day on which public announcement of the 2018 annual meeting date is made.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, in accordance with our By-laws, the shareholder notice must contain certain information about the candidate the shareholder desires to nominate for election as a director, the shareholder giving the notice and the beneficial owner, if any, on whose behalf the nomination is made.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The chairs of our Audit and Executive Compensation Committees received an additional annual cash retainer of $15,000, and our lead independent director, who is also chair of our Corporate Governance Committee, received an additional annual cash retainer of $20,000.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Responsibility
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ONEOK is engaged in the natural gas gathering and processing, natural gas liquids and natural gas pipelines businesses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As we have evolved from a traditional natural gas distributor into a major operator of midstream assets, we have maintained our focus on our stakeholders and our mission to operate in a safe, reliable and environmentally responsible manner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 2 - Ratify the Selection of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as our Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm for the Year Ending December 31, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RATIFICATION OF SELECTION OF PRICEWATERHOUSECOOPERS LLP AS OUR INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM FOR 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: accounting firm for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a matter of good corporate governance, the Audit Committee submits its selection of our independent auditor to our shareholders for ratification.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the shareholders should not ratify the appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP, the Audit Committee will reconsider the appointment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has the sole authority and responsibility to hire, evaluate and, where appropriate, replace the companys independent auditor and, in its capacity as a committee of our Board of Directors, is directly responsible for the appointment, compensation and general oversight of the work of the independent auditor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is responsible for approving the audit and permissible non-audit services provided by the independent auditor and the associated fees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In carrying out its duties in connection with the 2016 audit, PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP had unrestricted access to our Audit Committee to discuss audit findings and other financial matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Representatives of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP will be present at the annual meeting to answer questions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They also will have the opportunity to make a statement if they desire to do so.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approval of this proposal to ratify the selection of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm requires the affirmative vote of a majority of the voting power of the shareholders present in person or by proxy and entitled to vote on this proposal at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions will have the effect of a vote against the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee evaluates the performance of our independent auditor, including the senior audit engagement team, each year and determines whether to re-engage the current independent auditor or consider other audit firms.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In doing so, the Audit Committee considers the quality and efficiency of the services provided by the auditors, the auditors capabilities, the auditors technical expertise and knowledge of our operations and industry and the impact to the company in changing auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In connection with the mandated rotation of the independent auditors lead engagement partner, the Audit Committee and its chairperson are directly involved in the selection of the new lead engagement partner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your Board unanimously recommends a vote FOR the ratification of the selection of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on this evaluation, the Audit Committee has appointed PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP to serve as our independent auditor for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP has served as our independen auditor for ten years and is considered by management to be well qualified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Further, the Audit Committee and the Board of Directors believe that the continued retention of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP to serve as our independent auditor is in the best interests of the company and its shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors has ratified the selection by our Audit Committee of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP to serve as our independent (consistent with Securities and Exchange Commission and NYSE policies regarding independence) registered public

sentences.text: 2017 REPORT OF THE AUDIT COMMITTEE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The purpose of the Audit Committee is to assist the Board of Directors with the oversight of the integrity of the companys financial statements and internal control over financial reporting, the companys compliance with legal and regulatory requirements, the independence, qualifications and performance of the companys independent registered public accounting firm and the performance of the companys internal audit function.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committees function is more fully described in its charter, which the Board reviews and approves on an annual basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The charter is on and may be printed from the companys website at www.oneok.com and is also available from the companys corporate secretary upon request.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors annually reviews the definition of independence for audit committee members contained in the listing standards for the NYSE and applicable rules of the Securities and Exchange Commission, as well as our director independence guidelines, and has determined that each member of the Audit Committee is independent under those standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: AUDIT COMMITTEE POLICY ON SERVICES PROVIDED BY THE INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with Securities and Exchange Commission and NYSE policies regarding auditor independence, the Audit Committee has the responsibility for appointing, setting compensation and overseeing the work of our independent auditor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In furtherance of this responsibility, the Audit Committee has established a policy with respect to the pre-approval of audit and permissible non-audit services provided by our independent auditor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the 2016 and 2015 audit and non-audit services provided by PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP were approved by the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management is responsible for the preparation, presentation and integrity of the companys financial statements, accounting and financial reporting principles, internal controls and procedures designed to ensure compliance with accounting standards, applicable laws and regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The companys independent registered public accounting firm, PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP, is responsible for performing an independent audit of the companys consolidated financial statements and the companys internal control over financial reporting and expressing an opinion on the conformity of those financial statements with generally accepted accounting principles and on the effectiveness of the companys internal control over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to engagement of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as our independent auditor for the 2017 audit, a plan was submitted to and approved by the Audit Committee setting forth the audit services expected to be rendered during 2017, which are comprised of work performed in the audit of our financial statements and to attest and report on our internal controls over financial reporting, as well as work that only the independent auditor can reasonably be expected to provide, including quarterly review of our unaudited financial statements, comfort letters, statutory audits, attest services, consents and assistance with the review of documents filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this context, the Audit Committee has met and held discussions with management and the companys independent registered public accounting firm, PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP, regarding the fair and complete presentation of the companys financial results and managements report on its assessment of the companys internal control over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has discussed the significant accounting policies applied by the company in its financial statements, as well as alternative treatments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management has represented to the Audit Committee that the companys consolidated financial statements were prepared in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles, and the Audit Committee has reviewed and discussed the consolidated financial statements with management and the independent auditor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has adopted a policy that provides that fees for audit, audit related and tax services that are not included in the independent auditors annual services plan, and for services for which fees are not determinable on an annual basis, are pre-approved if the fees for such services will not exceed $75,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the policy provides that the Audit Committee may delegate pre-approval authority to one or more of its members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, we received, through our limited and general partner interests in ONEOK Partners, distributions of $790.0 million, an increase of approximately 11.9 percent compared with 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, we were able to deliver value to our shareholders in the form of an approximate 1.6 percent increase in our 2016 dividends compared with 2015, while retaining nearly $250 million in cash, providing significant financial flexibility during a period of lower commodity prices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Business
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On January 31, 2017, we and ONEOK Partners entered into the Merger Agreement, by and among us, Merger Sub, ONEOK Partners and ONEOK Partners GP, L.L.C., the sole general partner of ONEOK Partners, pursuant to which we will acquire all of the outstanding common units representing limited partner interests in ONEOK Partners not already directly or indirectly owned by us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon the terms and conditions set forth in the Merger Agreement, Merger Sub will be merged with and into ONEOK Partners, with ONEOK Partners continuing as a wholly owned subsidiary of ours, in a taxable transaction to ONEOK Partners unitholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Financial Performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our 2016 consolidated operating income was approximately $1.3 billion, compared with approximately $1.0 billion in 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 income from continuing operations attributable to us was approximately $354.1 million, or $1.67 per diluted share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2015 income from continuing operations attributable to us was approximately $251.1 million, or $1.19 per diluted share, which included non-cash impairment charges of approximately $264.3 million, or $0.33 per share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Until completion of the merger transaction referenced above, we will continue as the sole general partner and, as of December 31, 2016, we owned 41.2 percent of ONEOK Partners, L.P., one of the largest publicly traded master limited partnerships.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We provide management and resources to ONEOK Partners, enabling it to execute its growth strategies and allowing us to grow our dividend.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ONEOK Partners applies its core capabilities of gathering, processing, fractionating, transporting, storing and marketing natural gas and NGLs through the rebundling of services across the value chains through vertical integration in an effort to provide its customers with premium services at lower costs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ONEOK Partners is a leader in the gathering, processing, storage and transportation of natural gas in the United States.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, ONEOK Partners owns one of the nations premier natural gas liquids systems, connecting NGL supply in the Mid-Continent, Permian and Rocky Mountain regions with key market centers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dividend Increase.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, we paid total cash dividends of $2.46 per share, an increase of approximately 1.2 percent over the $2.43 per share paid during 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We paid total aggregate cash dividends to our shareholders of $517.6 million in 2016, an approximate 1.6 percent increase compared with $509.2 million paid in 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In January 2017, we declared a quarterly dividend of $0.615 per share ($2.46 per share on an annualized basis), which is unchanged from the quarterly dividend declared in January 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 Executive Compensation Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Due to a disciplined effort to achieve our strategic, operating and financial goals, management has strengthened the companys position in the current uncertain and volatile industry climate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We attribute a meaningful portion of this success to our incentive compensation program that is designed to pay for performance and to closely align our executives interests with those of our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Business Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While 2016 marked another year of uncertainty and challenges in the U.S. economy, especially in the energy markets, our performance reflected our continued attention to prudent capital deployment and effective execution of our business strategies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our named executive officers for 2016 were Terry K. Spencer, Derek S. Reiners, Robert F. Martinovich, Wesley J. Christensen and Walter S. Hulse III (referred to throughout as our named executive officers).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committees primary actions regarding 2016 compensation of our named executive officers included:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ONEOK Partners operates predominantly fee-based businesses in each of its three business segments and its consolidated earnings were approximately 88 percent fee-based in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We continue to expect demand for ONEOK Partners midstream services to provide supply and market connectivity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We expect producers to require midstream services to connect production with end-use markets, increased demand for NGL products from the petrochemical industry and NGL exporters and increased demand for natural gas from power plants currently fueled by coal and natural gas exports to Mexico.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For all named executive officers, holding salaries and short- and long-term incentive targets flat due to the uncertain industry environment, except for Mr. Spencers long-term incentive target which the Committee increased by $250,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee approved this increase to more competitively align Mr. Spencers total compensation with our Energy Peers (see Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MethodologyCompetitive Assessment below) and in recognition of the fact that
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Summary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee references the median level of the market when determining all elements of compensation with the possibility of above-market short-term incentive and long- term incentive payments for executive and company performance that exceeds our expectations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Spencer had not received an increase in his total target compensation since becoming our Chief Executive Officer in early 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Setting the metrics under our short-term cash incentive plan for 2016 to include two financial metricsONEOK Partners distributable cash flow per limited partner unit and ONEOK Partners return on invested capitaland two operational metricsTotal Reportable Incident Rate (TRIR) and Agency Reportable Environmental Event Rate (AREER).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We implement our pay-for-performance philosophy with a short-term incentive program providing for cash payments based on achievement of financial and operational goals established annually by the Committee and long-term performance-based equity incentive awards providing for vesting levels based on our total shareholder return over the vesting period compared with a specified peer group of energy companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approving long-term equity incentive grants to our named executive officers consisting of approximately 80 percent of the value in performance units and 20 percent of the value in restricted stock units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We encourage alignment of our named executive officers interests with those of our shareholders through the award of long-term incentive equity grants, of which approximately 80 percent are performance-vesting stock units and 20 percent are time-vesting restricted stock units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certifying, based on our total shareholder return performance relative to our peers, a zero percent payout to our named executive officers with respect to performance units granted in 2013 that vested in February 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This level of payout resulted because our relative total shareholder return was less than the 25th percentile of the total shareholder return of the specified peer group of energy companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive officers, including the named executive officers, receive no significant recurring perquisites or other personal benefits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have market competitive stock ownership guidelines for our executive officers, including the named executive officers, and members of our Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ratifying in February 2017 the companys level of achievement with respect to the financial and operating goals under our 2016 short-term incentive plan resulting in a corporate performance payout factor of 99.1 percent for our named executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have adopted compensation recovery (clawback) provisions permitting the Committee to use appropriate discretion to seek recoupment of grants of performance units (including any shares earned and the proceeds from any sale of such shares) and short-term cash incentive awards paid to employees in the event of any fraud, negligence or intentional misconduct by such employees that is determined to be a contributing factor to our having to restate all or a portion of our financial statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We expect to adopt a general clawback policy covering our annual and long-term incentive award plans and arrangements once the Securities and Exchange Commission adopts final clawback rules pursuant to The Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act of 2010.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specific Compensation Program Features
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation philosophy and related governance features are complemented by several specific elements that are designed to align our executive compensation with long-term shareholder interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The components of our executive compensation program have remained substantially the same for several years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe our program is designed effectively, well aligned with the interests of our shareholders and instrumental to achieving our business goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The main objectives of our compensation program are to pay for performance, to align our executive officers interests with those of our shareholders and to attract and retain qualified executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has adopted a policy prohibiting officers, members of our Board of Directors and certain employees designated as insiders under our Securities/Insider Trading Policy from engaging in short sales, derivative or speculative transactions in our securities, or purchasing or using, directly or indirectly through family members or other persons or entities, financial instruments (including puts or calls, prepaid variable forward contracts, equity swaps, collars and exchange funds) that are designed to hedge or offset any decrease in the market value of our securities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This policy was adopted as a sound governance practice, and we are not aware of any non-compliance of this policy by any of our officers, directors or the designated employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All compensation decisions regarding our named executive officers are made by the Committee and are then submitted to the full Board of Directors for approval.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee is composed solely of persons who qualify as independent directors under the listing standards of the NYSE.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We provide the following primary elements of compensation for our executive officers, including the named executive officers: base salary, annual short-term cash incentive awards and long-term equity incentive awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has adopted a policy prohibiting officers and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 PROXY STATEMENT       43  directors from holding our securities in a margin account or pledging our
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Compensation Philosophy
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pay-for-Performance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: securities as collateral for a loan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An exception to this prohibition may be granted by the Chief Executive Officer where an officer or director wishes to pledge shares of our stock as collateral for a loan (but not including a margin account), the officer or director clearly demonstrates the financial capacity to repay the loan without resort to the pledged securities, and the terms of the loan prohibit the sale of any of our stock held as collateral when the officer or director is not permitted to trade in our stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are not aware of any officer or member of our Board of Directors who has pledged any of his or her shares of our common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We structure our compensation program to align the interests of our employees, including our named executive officers, with the interests of our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe an employees compensation should be tied directly to the achievement of our strategic, financial and operating goals, all of which are designed to deliver value to our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, a significant part of each executives pay is at-risk, in the form of an annual short-term cash incentive award and long-term, equity-based incentive awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The amount of the annual short-term incentive award paid depends on our companys performance against financial and operating objectives, as well as the executive meeting key leadership and development standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The portion of our executives compensation in the form of equity awards ties their compensation directly to creating shareholder value over the long-term.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe this combination of annual short-term incentive awards and long- term equity awards aligns the incentives of our senior executives with our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee engages an independent executive compensation consultant which the Committee has determined to be independent under the Securities and Exchange Commission rules and NYSE listing standards to provide advice and expertise on the design and implementation of our executive and director compensation programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee will continue to monitor executive compensation trends and developments to ensure that we provide the appropriate types and levels of incentives in order to remain competitively positioned to attract and retain the executive talent necessary to achieve our strategic, financial and operational goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Competitive Pay
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe a competitive compensation program is an important tool to help us attract and retain talented executives capable of leading our company in the competitive business environment in which we operate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We seek to establish total compensation opportunities for our named executive officers that are within a competitive range of the median of compensation opportunities awarded at our peer companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eventual earned compensation from these opportunities can vary based on the company and individual performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In certain circumstances, we may target pay above or below the competitive median.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, to recognize an individuals unique qualifications or performance, we may choose to set their expected pay level above the median.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, if the executive is new to the role, we may set his or her expected pay below the median level.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specific Corporate Governance Features
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We seek to maintain good governance standards, including standards applicable to the oversight of our executive compensation policies and practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following policies and practices were in effect during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee is composed solely of independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committees independent executive compensation consultant, Meridian Compensation Partners, is retained directly by the Committee and performs no other services for the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee believes our compensation program does not provide incentives for excessive risk-taking, and therefore does not produce risks that are reasonably likely to have a material adverse effect on the company for the following reasons:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committees practice is to review our executive officer compensation program and make specific decisions in February of each year, including review and approval of base salaries; review and approval of the achievement of short-term cash incentive goals for the prior year; review and approval of short-term cash incentive program targets for the upcoming fiscal year; review and approval of the level of vesting of long- term incentive grants which were eligible to vest during the year; and review and approval of new long-term incentive grants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This review coincides with our Board of Directors review of our financial and operating results for the most recently completed year and allows the Committee to consider those results, as well as our financial and operating plan for the upcoming year, as it makes compensation decisions.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have a defined contribution 401(k) retirement plan covering all of our employees, including our named executive officers, and we match contributions of our employees under this plan up to six percent of eligible compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also maintain a defined benefit pension plan covering Messrs. Spencer and Christensen and certain other employees hired prior to January 1, 2005, and a Profit Sharing Plan covering Messrs. Reiners, Martinovich and Hulse, and other employees hired after December 31, 2004.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Profit Sharing Plan, we made a contribution to the plan each calendar quarter during 2016 that resulted in allocation to the participants plan account of an amount equal to one percent of the participants eligible compensation for that quarter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also made an additional discretionary contribution to the participants account at year end equal to four percent of the participants eligible 2016 compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Profit Sharing Plan does not provide for any contributions to be made by plan participants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe our executive compensation program also must be internally consistent and equitable in order for the company to achieve its corporate objectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, when making grants of long-term, equity-based incentive grants each year, the Committee considers, among other factors it deems relevant, the size of grants of long-term, equity-based compensation made in prior years.

sentences.text: Respectfully submitted by the members of the Executive Compensation Committee of the Board of Directors:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have entered into a services agreement with ONEOK Partners pursuant to which we provide various services to ONEOK Partners, including the services of certain members of our management who serve as officers of the sole general partner of ONEOK Partners.

sentences.text: a  For additional information on our Nonqualified Deferred Compensation Plan, see Pension BenefitsNonqualified Deferred Compensation Plan below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: b  Our 401(k) Plan is a tax-qualified plan that covers substantially all of our employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employee contributions are discretionary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subject to certain limits, we match 100 percent of employee contributions to the plan up to a maximum of 6 percent of eligible compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: c  At December 31, 2016, our Profit Sharing Plan covered all full-time employees hired after December 31, 2004, and employees who accepted a one-time opportunity to opt out of our Retirement Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We plan to make a contribution to the Profit Sharing Plan each quarter equal to 1 percent of each participants eligible compensation during the quarter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional discretionary employer contributions may be made at the end of each year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employee contributions are not allowed under the plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: d  Reflects incremental costs incurred by our company for personal use of our corporate aircraft by Mr. Hulse that relates to one segment of a flight whose primary purpose was to conduct company business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The incremental cost of personal use of our company aircraft is calculated based on the cost of fuel, crew travel, on-board catering, trip-related maintenance, landing fees and trip-related hangar and parking costs and other similar variable costs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Fixed costs that do not change based on usage, such as pilot salaries, home hangar expenses and general taxes and insurance are excluded from the incremental cost calculation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If our aircraft flies empty before picking up or dropping off a passenger flying for personal reasons, this deadhead segment is included in the incremental cost of the personal use.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: e  Mr. Hulse joined our company as Executive Vice President, Strategic Planning and Corporate Affairs in February 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The relocation and commuting expenses reflected in the table relate to the expenses incurred in relocating Mr. Hulse and his family from their home in New Jersey to our headquarters in Tulsa, Oklahoma.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Hulses relocation expenses were grossed up for tax purposes and the amounts in the table reflect $67,761 and $46,242 in taxes for 2016 and 2015, respectively, for his relocation allowance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, Mr. Hulse was reimbursed for travel expenses in the amount of $4,227 incurred in 2015 under a consulting arrangement with the company which terminated upon his becoming an executive officer of our company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: f   Under our Employee Stock Award Program, we have issued one share of our common stock to all eligible employees (full-time employees and employees on short-term disability), including our named executive officers for no additional cash consideration, when the per-share closing price of our common stock on the NYSE was above $13 (taking into account our two-for-one split in 2012) per share for the first time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have issued and will continue to issue, for no additional cash consideration, one additional share of our common stock to all eligible employees when the closing price on the NYSE is at or above each one dollar increment above $13 per share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: g  Reflects charitable contributions made by our company or the ONEOK Foundation, Inc. on behalf of the named executive officer consisting of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) matching contributions up to $5,000 per year made to non-profit organizations of the officers choice under our matching grant program, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) matching contributions to the United Way pursuant to our annual United Way Contribution Program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other than as set forth above, the named executive officers did not receive perquisites or other personal benefits with an aggregate value of $10,000 or more during 2014, 2015 or 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Hulses annual salary and non-equity incentive plan compensation reflect the prorated amounts for his service from February through December 2015.

sentences.text: The ONEOK, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Retirement Plan is a defined benefit pension plan qualified under the Tax Code and is subject to the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, as amended.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At December 31, 2016, the plan covered full-time employees hired prior to January 1, 2005.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employees hired after January 1, 2005, and employees who accepted a one-time opportunity to opt out of our Retirement Plan in 2004 are now covered by our Profit Sharing Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Benefits under our Retirement Plan generally become vested and non-forfeitable after completion of five years of continuous employment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the plan, a vested participant receives a monthly retirement benefit at normal retirement age, unless an early retirement benefit is elected under the plan, in which case the retirement benefit may be actuarially reduced for early commencement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Generally, participants retiring on or after age 62 through normal retirement age receive 100 percent of their accrued monthly benefit which may be reduced depending on the optional form of payment elected at retirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accrued monthly benefits are calculated at the participants retirement date based on the participants credited service, limited to a maximum of 35 years, multiplied by a percentage of their final average earnings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The earnings utilized in the Retirement Plan benefit formula for employees include the base salary and short-term incentive compensation paid to an employee during the period of the
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We maintain a Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan (SERP) as a nonqualified supplemental retirement benefit plan for certain officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The SERP provides that officers may be selected for participation in a supplemental retirement benefit or an excess retirement benefit, or both.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a participant is eligible for both the supplemental retirement benefit and the excess retirement benefit, the excess retirement benefit and benefits payable under our Retirement Plan are treated as an offset that reduces the supplemental retirement benefit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Participants in the SERP were selected by our Chief Executive Officer or, in the case of our Chief Executive Officer, by our Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors may amend or terminate the SERP at any time, provided that accrued benefits to current participants may not be reduced.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We do not enter into individual employment agreements with our executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instead, in general, the rights of our executives with respect to specific events are covered by our compensation and benefit plans.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The use of a plan approach instead of individual employment agreements serves several objectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: First, the plan approach provides us with more flexibility to change the terms of severance benefits from time to time if necessary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Second, the plan approach is more transparent, both internally and externally.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Internal transparency eliminates the need to negotiate separation benefits on a case-by-case basis and assures an executive that his or her severance benefits are comparable with those of his or her peers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Finally, the plan approach is easier for us to administer, as it requires less time and expense.
